pages.text: $(l)DESCRIPTION: $(br)$()This blade is used by the Helioblade to slice through their opponents during battle. It can also be used as a ranged weapon to blast enemies from afar with destruction.
$(l)OBTAINING: $(br)$()This weapon is uncraftable as you don't have the experience of [REDACTED], though, you can obtain it by killing the Helioblade.
